Package com.quackology.duckdevices.filters

Class KalmanFilter

java.lang.Object
com.quackology.duckdevices.filters.KalmanFilter
public class KalmanFilter extends Object
Kalman filter Can be extended to handle non-linear systems using the extended Kalman filter by setting the state transition function and the measurement function

      Constructor for the Kalman filter
      Parameters:
      x - initial state
      p - initial state covariance
      f - state transition function
      q - process noise covariance
      u - control input
      b - control transformation

  • Method Details

    • predict

      public void predict()
      Predict the next state To deal with time varying systems, the state transition function and process noise covariance should be updated before calling this method

    • update

      Parameters:

      z - measurement
      r - measurement noise covariance
